addImplicationClauses() - Method in class apryraz.tworld.TreasureFinder
Adds all implications for each sensor and positions on the map For each sensor: For each xy in N*N: Sxy -> -"all except(+ or corners)" or -"9x9 around agent" Where: Sensor 1 or Sensor 2 or 3 and xy is the position
addImplicationFromOffsets(int, int, int[][], int) - Method in class apryraz.tworld.TreasureFinder
Given an offset array, used for mapping specific positions around an (x,y) position, creates an implication where those positions are negated.
addImplicationOutsideSquare(int, int, int) - Method in class apryraz.tworld.TreasureFinder
Negates all positions which are not around our X,Y position.
addLastFutureClausesToPastClauses() - Method in class apryraz.tworld.TreasureFinder
This function should add all the clauses stored in the list futureToPast to the formula stored in solver.
addWorldClauses(int) - Method in class apryraz.tworld.TreasureFinder
Adds all the world clauses where the treasure can be In past and future

AMessage - Class in apryraz.tworld
Class for representing messages exchanged between agents and the World interface object
AMessage(String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class apryraz.tworld.AMessage
Class constructor
apryraz.tworld - package apryraz.tworld
This package contains an implementation of the Treasure World, where an agent has to find the location of the Treasure using the detector sensor to get information about the world.
